languages.text: "Доволен ли я тем, что убрал препятствие со своего пути? Он не смел мне даже перечить, не говоря уже об отказе в содействии. Я сделал то, что требовала ситуация. А теперь — оставим это".

traits.locale_text: "Доволен ли я тем, что убрал препятствие со своего пути? Он не смел мне даже перечить, не говоря уже об отказе в содействии. Я сделал то, что требовала ситуация. А теперь — оставим это".

languages.text: "Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."
languages.original_text: "Доволен ли я тем, что убрал препятствие со своего пути? Он не смел мне даже перечить, не говоря уже об отказе в содействии. Я сделал то, что требовала ситуация. А теперь — оставим это".

traits.locale_text: "Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

"Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

"Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

"Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

languages.text: “我扫清了道路上的障碍，你觉得我满不满意？他无权质疑我的行为，更无权拒绝与我合作。我只是迫于形势，不得不这么做而已。好了，这件事情咱们先放下吧。”
languages.original_text: "Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

traits.locale_text: “我扫清了道路上的障碍，你觉得我满不满意？他无权质疑我的行为，更无权拒绝与我合作。我只是迫于形势，不得不这么做而已。好了，这件事情咱们先放下吧。”

languages.text: «¿Que si me alegro de haber eliminado un obstáculo de mi camino? No tenía ningún derecho a protestar mi decisión, y menos a negarse a cooperar. He hecho lo que la situación exigía. Por ahora, dejemos el tema».
languages.original_text: "Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que si me alegro de haber eliminado un obstáculo de mi camino? No tenía ningún derecho a protestar mi decisión, y menos a negarse a cooperar. He hecho lo que la situación exigía. Por ahora, dejemos el tema».

languages.text: 「私は、行く手から障害物を取り除いたことを喜ぶべきなのだろうか？彼には、協力を拒むどころか、抗議の言葉を口にする権利もなかった。私は状況に応じて必要な事をしただけだ。だから今は、それを捨てるだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、行く手から障害物を取り除いたことを喜ぶべきなのだろうか？彼には、協力を拒むどころか、抗議の言葉を口にする権利もなかった。私は状況に応じて必要な事をしただけだ。だから今は、それを捨てるだけだ」

languages.text: « Je suis content d'avoir supprimé un obstacle qui me barrait la route, oui. Il n'avait aucun droit de protester ni de refuser de coopérer. J'ai fait ce qui s'imposait, alors n'en parlons plus. »
languages.original_text: "Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis content d'avoir supprimé un obstacle qui me barrait la route, oui. Il n'avait aucun droit de protester ni de refuser de coopérer. J'ai fait ce qui s'imposait, alors n'en parlons plus. »

languages.text: "Ob ich zufrieden bin, dass ich ein Hindernis aus meinem Weg geräumt habe? Er hatte kein Recht, auch nur ein Wort des Protests zu sprechen, geschweige denn, die Kooperation zu verweigern. Ich tat, was die Situation erforderte. Wir sollten das Thema also hier beenden."
languages.original_text: "Am I pleased that I removed an obstacle from my path? He had no right to say so much as a word in protest, let alone refuse to cooperate. I did what the situation required. So now, let's just drop it."

traits.locale_text: "Ob ich zufrieden bin, dass ich ein Hindernis aus meinem Weg geräumt habe? Er hatte kein Recht, auch nur ein Wort des Protests zu sprechen, geschweige denn, die Kooperation zu verweigern. Ich tat, was die Situation erforderte. Wir sollten das Thema also hier beenden."
